pkgmetadata.longdescription: Authenticate as a 'GitHub' App // 'GitHub' apps provide a powerful way to manage fine grained programmatic access to specific 'git' repositories, without having to create dummy users, and which are safer than a personal access token for automated tasks. This package extends the 'gh' package to let you authenticate and interact with 'GitHub' https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview in 'R' as an app.
